Description: Terracotta model coffin(no lid) containing a pottery mummiform figure of Sokar on a bed of straw.
Curator's comments: Published: N. Strudwick, The Legacy of Lord Carnarvon, Wyoming 2001, pp. 27-28 [17].
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1989 Jun-Sep, Swaffham Museum, Wonderful Things! The Howard Carter Exhibition
Acquisition name: Donated by: George Herbert, 5th Earl of Carnarvon
